content: {"name": "Christ United Methodist Church", "alternate_name": "", "description": null, "email": "", "url": "https://christchurchinthecity.org/contact/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "900 4th Street SW Washington, DC 20024", "address_2": null, "city": "Washington", "state_province": "DC", "postal_code": "20024", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 38.878911, "longitude": -77.016784}, "phones": [{"number": "(202) 669-2664", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "19:00", "closes_at": "21:00"}, {"weekday": "Saturday", "opens_at": "17:30", "closes_at": "18:30"}, {"weekday": "Saturday", "opens_at": "17:30", "closes_at": "18:30"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "19:00", "closes_at": "21:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Must bring own bags/cart"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Registration required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "First come, first serve: open until food runs out"}]}
